Built for Protection

Every feature designed with survivor safety and legal admissibility in mind.

Complete Privacy

Your files never upload to any server. All processing happens locally on your device using military-grade encryption.

SHA-256 Hashing

Generate unique cryptographic fingerprints for each piece of evidence, ensuring tamper-proof verification.

Blockchain Timestamps

Record immutable timestamps on Hedera Hashgraph, providing legally admissible proof of when evidence existed.

Case Management

Organize evidence by case with custom categories, tags, and descriptions for easy retrieval during legal proceedings.

Smart Search

Quickly find evidence across all your cases with powerful search and filtering by date, type, or category.

Legal Reports

Generate comprehensive PDF reports with verification certificates ready for court submission.

How It Works

Three simple steps to secure your evidence with legally admissible blockchain proof.

01

Select Your Evidence

Choose photos, videos, messages, or documents from your device. Files are processed locally and never uploaded.

02

Generate Cryptographic Proof

Our system creates a unique SHA-256 hash — a digital fingerprint that proves your evidence hasn't been altered.

03

Record on Blockchain

The hash and timestamp are permanently recorded on Hedera Hashgraph, creating irrefutable proof of when your evidence existed.

Stories of Strength

Real experiences from survivors and advocates who have used GBV Vault to secure justice.

"When I finally had the courage to report, the police questioned the authenticity of my screenshots. With GBV Vault, I had blockchain-verified proof that my evidence existed months before the investigation began. It changed everything."

Anonymous

Nairobi County • Domestic Violence Survivor
